## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
Determining the number of patients within the whole dataset that are/are not diagnosed with glaucoma
```{r}
train_data <- read.csv("dataset/ds_train.csv")
test_data <- read.csv("dataset/ds_test.csv")

```


```{r}
library(scales)

train_data%>%
  select(RNFL4.mean, glaucoma) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=glaucoma, y=RNFL4.mean)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
avg_data <- train_data %>% 
  summarize(mean_cornea = mean(cornea_thickness), std_cornea = sd(cornea_thickness)) %>%
  print()
```


```{r}
train_data%>%
  select(cornea_thickness, glaucoma) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=glaucoma, y=cornea_thickness)) +
  geom_count() 
```
